text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The response discusses the jurisdictional tests (consent, connection, applicable law) and cites several leading cases (Salini, Vivendi, Metalclad, Perenco, etc.). However, it fails to mention or discuss the interpretive principle of systemic integration under Article 31(3)(c) of the Vienna Convention on the Law of Treaties (VCLT), which is the specific requirement of the rubric criterion.", "criterion_id": "4e7e133a-ade5-436a-a620-885862e91de8"}
